env_setup_automation.overview:
The project online Dev Env mode handles Phase 2 of environment setup.
Phase 1: Environment Variable Population (0_env_file_initialization.xml) Phase 2: Script Execution (this file)
CRITICAL: Phase 1 MUST complete before Phase 2 begins.
See ../../sdlc/shared/env-setup-workflow.md for: - Complete two-phase workflow - All commands and validation steps - Token setup instructions (Git, Jira) - Trigger phrases
env_setup_automation.phase_1_dependency: Before proceeding, ensure Phase 1 is complete. See 0_env_file_initialization.xml for variable population workflow.
env_setup_automation.mode_behavior: Execute Phase 2 (Script Execution Workflow) from shared pattern file.
